diff_hunk:
@@ -127,7 +126,7 @@ def __new__(cls,
     ModeKeys.validate(mode)
 
     # Assert all ops are from the same graph.
-    get_graph_from_inputs((predictions, loss, train_op))
+    ops.IndexedSlices(predictions, loss, train_op)
body: The contrib framework function exposes an internal function from `tensorflow.python.framework.ops`. Rather than do that, I rather directly call on the `ops.IndexedSlices` class from `tensorflow.python.framework.ops` which then calls its own internal function without jeopardizing protected access.
body_html: The contrib framework function exposes an internal function from tensorflow.python.framework.ops. Rather than do that, I rather directly call on the ops.IndexedSlices class from tensorflow.python.framework.ops which then calls its own internal function without jeopardizing protected access.
body_text: The contrib framework function exposes an internal function from tensorflow.python.framework.ops. Rather than do that, I rather directly call on the ops.IndexedSlices class from tensorflow.python.framework.ops which then calls its own internal function without jeopardizing protected access.
